derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin reverendus 'person to be revered', gerundive of revereri (see revere)

entry.tran: (用在正式任命的宗教领袖的名字或身份前表示尊敬，缩略形式为Rev或Revd)大人
entry.def: Reverend is a title used before the name or rank of an officially appointed religious leader. The abbreviation Rev or Revd is also used.

example.ex: The service was led by the Reverend Jim Simons.
example.tran: 这次礼拜仪式是由吉姆·西蒙斯牧师大人主持的。

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the clergy and a spiritual leader of the Christian Church
